text:
Employees in a local
office of an organization that is engaged in securing subscriptions for
magazines from persons throughout the United States are engaged in activities
that are so closely related to the interstate movement of the orders for the
magazines that they are regarded as engaged in interstate commerce.
html: Employees in a local office of an organization that is engaged in securing subscriptions for magazines from persons throughout the United States are engaged in activities that are so closely related to the interstate movement of the orders for the magazines that they are regarded as engaged in interstate commerce.
